title: Neat Miss Fortune Harrowing skin
body:
Found this. (I didn't draw it.)

http://danbooru.donmai.us/data/4301f6b6b6de431f0fa0c5fa83490b55.jpg

Source: http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=medium&illust_id=46553110

That'd be a cool basis, at least.

replies.body: that Looks AMAZING, Yes yes yes !!!
Agreed.  This looks fantastic for an All Hallows Eve skin.
Love it!
I would buy it :p
Rito plz! This skin is amazing! Or if MF has too many skins, use the same concept for a Jinx skin. Lord knows she needs one.

I read rumor about a New Year's themed Jinx skin that includes fireworks particles on her abilities, possibly being released around that time, though not sure if it will be western new year or Chinese new year. lol.
looks like shaco tbh, that was my first thought.

That's actually kinda true. But probably mustly because the theme is closer to shaco's than it is to the old pirate theme. 
In game noone could mistake the two. 

Love it.
No it doesn't lol
The best part is the spooky nocturne VU on the right.
10/10, would play. ^-^
This is quite nice!
Very original idea, I like it.
instead they decided to give Soraka a Harrowing skin :/
Super well done.
didn't miss fortune get an arcade skin recently? Don't think riot is going to release another one so soon.
They can do this for next year.
Ghosts on her ult? that'd be sweet
Why cant riot do stuff like this instead of the crap they usually put out now
MAKE THIS!!!!!
i feel she is jinx !
We don't need another mf skin, but still this peace is quite hot
This would be so cool! But I think every champion needs a Halloween skin!
RIOT MAKE THIS SKIN PLEASE

I have to log in to see it's original size?

Anyone wanna save it and attach it?

It looks good from what I can see.
Yes Would Buy right now
i would buy this skin
I want this!!!! Riot make this HAPPEN!!!
Very Nice!
Hell! Rito, please!

Please Rito.
Or just make another {{champion:17}}  to recieve in all mystery gifts xD
I want it <3
except she needs to be reworked in this bot lane onslaught of tris/lucian/corki
Wow if they did this I would buy it in a heartbeat. Its so sexy @_@!
I would insta-buy this skin

Looks great :3
Honestly can't wait for the Halloween skins to be on sale; I've had to miss the past two for one reason or another, and seriously want that Zombie Brand skin...
so fancy, you already know ♫

The art is very high quality.  The actual theme is just about piss poor.  I can't figure what she's supposed to be or what she's using as weapons.  A witch?  With candle...guns?  Or something?  Other than "check it out, tits and a witch hat with some candles", I'm just not really wow'd by any of it.  It could be anybody, has nothing to do with MF.
